attributes.action: Put Extinction Rebellion activists who shut down Heathrow on no-fly lists!
attributes.background: Extinction Rebellion activists have already caused major disruption to London by closing bridges and blocking Oxford Street. Next they plan to close down Heathrow for 10 days in July causing misery for holiday makers. I say ban them from flying if they do and force them to practice what they preach!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are limited circumstances where someone can be prevented from flying. You can find out more information here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/419838/49013_Official_ATC_Scheme_accessible.pdf

If you would the Government to change the rules on the grounds an individual can be added to the list, you could start a petition on that.
